name: Time Sacrifice
description:
After 3 days of learning GODOT engine .I desire to join Ludumdare game jam.Solo creating this game

So here is the game

You convert your IRL lifetime(wasted time) to LifeCoin (1 Sec = 1 LifeCoin) that you can't do anything with it(I give up)

Controls:

Arrow keys = Movement

That's it !
